turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey! I'm craving coffee, could you place a Starbucks order for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hey, yeah I can do that. What do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll do a Grande latte with an extra shot of espresso. Nothing else in it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Skim milk would be perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Which Starbucks do you want me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one by the college.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, just to make sure, what street is it on?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's the Starbucks near GVSU on Fulton South West.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Do you need anything else, or just the coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just the coffee, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, when are you going to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Around 20 minutes from now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me just place the order and then I'll confirm everything.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, done! They'll have a Grande Latte with skim milk and an extra shot of espresso ready for you in 20 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's all. I appreciate it!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing!
